title: Porta Collina
description: The Porta Collina was a gate in Rome's Servian Wall located on the Quirinal Hill. At the Porta Collina the Via Salaria and the Via Nomentana divided. Some remains of the gate were identified in 1872 on the Via Venti Settembre beneath the Italian Ministry of Finance.

properties.description: Approximate point location of the former Porta Collina based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location
